description.value:
Requirements You are in Stumbling Stance.

You lash out confusingly with what seems to be a weak move but instead allows you to unleash a dangerous flurry of blows upon your unsuspecting foe.

When you use @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Flurry of Blows]{Flurry of Blows}, you can attempt a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Feint]{Feint} as a free action just before the first @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike}. On a success, instead of making the target @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} against your next attack, they become flat-footed against both attacks from the Flurry of Blows.
